text: A useful Chinese passage describing a classroom.你想知道我的教室是什么样子的吗？它很宽敞明亮。教室里有三十个桌子和椅子。墙上有两个黑板，和三幅画。教室的天花板上有四个电扇。电扇是蓝色的。在教室的角落里有两个书架。书架上有各种类型的图书。我非常喜欢读书。我也很喜欢我的教室。Inside the classroom there are thirty tables and chairs. There are two blackboards and three drawings on the wall.The classroom’s ceiling has four electric fans. The fans are blue.In the corner of the classroom there are two bookcases. On the bookcases there are all kinds of books.I really like reading books. I also really like my classroom.1 – 在书架上应该放什么？a. 桌子b. 书c. 手机d. 宠物1. bReview frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
